CustomField.description: If checked, the Contact can be transferred by the JustOn Connector.
CustomField.formula: NOT(ISBLANK( Account__c )) && NOT(ISBLANK( Backend_ID__c )) && (TEXT(Platform__c)="PizzaDE" || TEXT(Platform__c)="LieferheldDE") && Account__r.ON_Upsertable__c && ISBLANK(Account__r.ON_LastUpsertError__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, the Contact can be transferred by the JustOn Connector.
CustomField.label: Connector: Upsertable
